title: Make Support rewarding to play
body:
Not many people like the support role. RIOT lets make it rewarding to play.
EG:
reward skins for S+ gameplay
reward multi-kill assists game wide announcement and bonus gold similar to triple kills / quadra kills.
Give bonus gold each time your ward spots an enemy (cooldown if needed)
Give larger bonus gold for clearing enemy wards with sightstone equipped
Create a healing/shielding mastery that gives bonus AP/AD for 3 secs after you heal/shield an ally.
Give crafting rewards for most heals/shields/damage absorbed per game. 



Enough with the ADC getting all the gold and accolades.

There is a wide disconnnect between the boards and the game.
IF these responses indicate the current support situation, then why does 1/2 of my matches get dodged because someone got autofilled support? Why is there autofill in the first place?
Sure shoot my ideas down, but at least come up with some of your own

It's less a disconnect between boards and the game than it is between levels of play. The lower the level of play the less consistent it is, and the less likely a player is to be able to play multiple roles (or even multiple champs). For many, support is either a main role or a way down the list of prefs role (whether they can play it or not), and since it requires a completely different mentality to play, many people in the lower levels of play do not wish to learn it, since it means a vast shift from what they are used to. 

That coupled with this: http://askghostcrawler.tumblr.com/post/153923542358/how-many-competing-theories-are-there-answering is why many people do not want to play support, and this is especially true in lower levels of play where flexibility is very limited.

Autofill exists because without it queues in high elos where pop is small, and low elo where there aren't enough supports are 20+ minutes. @0 minutes is the maximum punishment for afking and leaving games, so regular players facing those queue times is not ok. 

Do I think support could be more rewarding? Sure. Do I think much of that reward lies in a perspective shift from the community? Yes.

Okay, so as Much as every support including myself would love these to be in effect, we would be op once we get sightstone and 1 assist streak.


> reward skins for S+ gameplay

I don't think it fair for summoners who play support to get a free skin. Because, all roles should be treated equally.

> reward multi-kill assists game wide announcement and bonus gold similar to triple kills / quadra kills.

If this was the case the other roles should get it to, Actually when I think about your avatar circle could be next to the champion who got the kill.

> Give bonus gold each time your ward spots an enemy (cooldown if needed)

As a support main I understand even when fed your gold is lower then your ADC's but this would be a ridiculous amount of gold added for free, once you get sightstone.

> Give larger bonus gold for clearing enemy wards with sightstone equipped

Every role should be treated equally and this is already a rewarding advantage anyway removing their vision.

> Create a healing/shielding mastery that gives bonus AP/AD for 3 secs after you heal/shield an ally.

This is the only one where I can see riot doing. But, There are already items that do this: {{item:3222}}{{item:3050}}{{item:3800}}{{item:3109}}{{item:3504}} Okay some of these items don't give AD/AP boosts but they give utility boosts which increase the DPS in fights, so if riot added a mastery which increases AD/AP stats it could be a bit op.

> Give crafting rewards for most heals/shields/damage absorbed per game.

Well this is your job as the support role, So your rewarded with a win if you do it correctly and you get crafting rewards by getting good score (S- or better) which is a chest or key fragment.
